translations.name: Amharic Orthodox-Septuagint Deuterocanonical Version
translations.description: The Amharic Bible - This translation of the Bible is for the speakers of Amharic, which is primarily spoken in Ethiopia. This translation uses an informal language style, and applies a meaning-based translation philosophy. It is translated from the biblical languages. The New Testament was completed in 1988, and the Old Testament in 2001.
